testcase.classname: Create an event using added contact details
testcase.name: 1 : Add a new contact to the system and create an event using added contact details
testcase.system-out: Given user in the homepage..................................................passed When user navigate to contact page..........................................passed And user navigate to create new contact.....................................passed And user create a new contact first name as "Shamika" middle name as "Sajeewa" last name as "Kiriwaththuduwa" company name as "Company123" email as "shamika123@gmail.com".passed And user save the created contact...........................................passed Then user able to view created contact......................................passed When user navigate to calendar page.........................................passed And user navigate to create new event page..................................passed And user enter event title as "title here" and participants as "Shamika"....passed Then user able to select added contact name from participant field..........passed
